channel.title: CVE Feed for Rockwell Automation -- FactoryTalk Transaction Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rockwell Automation -- FactoryTalk Transaction Manager

item.title: CVE-2023-2778|2024-08-02T06:33:05.706Z -- rockwell%20automation -- factorytalk%20transaction%20manager
item.description: A denial-of-service vulnerability exists in Rockwell Automation FactoryTalk Transaction Manager. This vulnerability can be exploited by sending a modified packet to port 400. If exploited, the application could potentially crash or experience a high CPU or memory usage condition, causing intermittent application functionality issues. The application would need to be restarted to recover from the DoS.
